select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into message(send_user_id, receive_user_id, message, create_time,chat_room_id) values(#{sendUserId}, #{receiveUserId},#{message}, now(),#{chatRoomId})
mapper.select: select m.*, mup.user_nick, fup.user_nick from message m LEFT JOIN user_profile mup on m.send_user_id=mup.id LEFT JOIN user_profile fup on m.receive_user_id=fup.id where chat_room_id=${chatRoomId} order by m.id desc limit 5
